text: Lalli Simo Samuli Partinen (20 August 1941 â€“ 4 May 2022) was a Finnish professional ice hockey player. He played for HIFK and SaiPa. He competed in the men's tournament at the 1968 Winter Olympics. He was honored into the Finnish Hockey Hall of Fame in 1987. He was born in Kannonkoski, Finland. Partinen died of COVID-19 at hospital in Lappeenranta, Finland on 4 May 2022, at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic Category:Olympians for Finland Category:Finnish ice hockey left wingers
title: Lalli Partinen
